long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of manually removing comments from your code? VI-PR is here to wipe your comments, without harming the indentation or the way you write your code. Copy your code, paste it into VI-PR, and voila, you're done. You can copy it into your clipboard, or see the output right in the extension itself! Let's wipe some comments away.
